00016 #define ABS(a) ((a) < 0) ? (-1*(a)) : (a)

00018 #ifndef N
00019 #define N(arr) sizeof(arr) / sizeof(*arr)

00022 #define SAFE_DELETE(ptr) if (ptr != NULL) { delete ptr; ptr = NULL; }
00023 
00024 #define SAFE_DELETE_WITH_ELEMENTS(arrPtr, arrSize) do { \
00025         if (arrPtr != NULL) {                                                           \
00026                 for (int n = 0; n < arrSize; n++) {                             \
00027                         SAFE_DELETE(arrPtr[n]);                                         \
00028                 }                                                                                               \
00029                 delete arrPtr;                                                                  \
00030                 arrPtr = NULL;                                                                  \
00031         }                                                                                                       \
00032 } while (0)
00033 
00034 #define SAFE_REPLACE(dst, src) do {                                     \
00035         SAFE_DELETE(dst);                                                                       \
00036         dst = src;                                                                                      \
00037 } while (0)

00039 inline static double *NewZeroDoubleArray(int size)
00040 {
00041         double *array = new double[size];
00042 
00043         for (int n = 0; n < size; n++) {
00044                 array[n] = 0;
00045         }
00046         return array;
00047 }

00049 inline static int RoundHigh(double value)
00050 {
00051         int iv = (int) value;
00052 
00053         if (((double) iv) > value)
00054                 iv++;
00055         return iv;
00056 }

00058 static inline int maxV(int count, int first, ...)
00059 {
00060         int maxValue = first;
00061         int n;
00062         va_list args;
00063 
00064         va_start(args, first);
00065 
00066         for (n = 1; n < count; n++) {
00067                 int value = va_arg(args, int);
00068                 maxValue = wxMax(maxValue, value);
00069         }
00070         va_end(args);
00071         return maxValue;
00072 }
